Package veslo.constant

Class SonarRuleConstants

java.lang.Object
veslo.constant.SonarRuleConstants
public class SonarRuleConstants
extends Object
Sonar rules constants

Author:
Oleg Shaburov (shaburov.o.a@gmail.com) Created: 22.02.2022

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static String SONAR_COGNITIVE_COMPLEXITY
    Cognitive Complexity of methods should not be too high
    static String SONAR_EXCEPTION_IMMUTABLE
    Exception classes should be immutable
    static String SONAR_GENERIC_EXCEPTIONS_THROWN
    Generic exceptions should never be thrown
    static String SONAR_GENERIC_WILDCARD_TYPES
    Generic wildcard types should not be used in return types
    static String SONAR_TYPE_PARAMETER_NAMING
    Type parameter names should comply with a naming convention
